raw_text: Following the timely emphasis on end-to-end evaluation, the official track used predicted mentions and measured performance using five co reference measures: MUC (Vilain et al, 1995), B 3 (Bagga and Baldwin, 1998), CEAF e (Luo, 2005), CEAF m (Luo, 2005), and BLANC (Recasens and Hovy, 2011)
clean_text: Following the timely emphasis on end-to-end evaluation, the official track used predicted mentions and measured performance using five coreference measures: MUC (Vilain et al, 1995), B 3 (Bagga and Baldwin, 1998), CEAF e (Luo, 2005), CEAF m (Luo, 2005), and BLANC (Recasens and Hovy, 2011).
